1039660.name: Fantasy Grounds - Star Battles: Space Map Pack (Map Pack)
1039660.description:
Star Battles: Space Map Pack

This collection of stunning maps includes 12 incredible scenes of space and is ideal for a ship fights in your science fiction/science fantasy campaign. Each map includes a gridless version, a square grid, and a hex grid so you can use these in any game system.
Star Battles: Space Map Pack includes:
  • 2 star fields of deep space nebulae
  • 5 planets with rings
  • 3 planets and moon
  • 1 of a planet and a space station and
  • 1 of a planet alone in space
Give your game a stunning background for the most epic of battles!
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Dale Mc Coy
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
